content.text: 获取Boa进程ID用于进程管理和调试。Gets the Boa process ID for process management and debugging purposes in Python-JavaScript integration.
Boa进程ID。The process ID of the current Boa Python interpreter instance

text.comment:
Function:

getBoa

Description:

获取Boa进程ID用于进程管理和调试。Gets the Boa process ID for process management and debugging purposes in Python-JavaScript integration.

Returns:

Boa进程ID。The process ID of the current Boa Python interpreter instance

Example:

// Get current Boa process ID const processId = getBoa(); console.log(Boa process ID: ${processId});

Example:

// Use for process monitoring const pid = getBoa(); console.log(Python interpreter running on PID: ${pid});

Example:
// Debug Python integration
try {
  const boaPid = getBoa();
  console.log('Python integration active, PID:', boaPid);
} catch (error) {
  console.error('Boa not available:', error.message);
}
